input_data.title: Resident Alien
input_data.overview: Crash-landed alien Harry takes on the identity of a small-town Colorado doctor. Arriving with a secret mission, he starts off living a simple life…but things get a bit rocky when he’s roped into solving a local murder and realizes he needs to assimilate into his new world. As he does, he begins to wrestle with the moral dilemma of his mission and asking the big life questions like: “Are human beings worth saving?” and “Why do they fold their pizza before eating it?”

response.analytical_summary: Resident Alien is a comedic science fiction series that blends absurdist humor with a surprisingly poignant exploration of humanity. An alien tasked with eliminating humanity crash-lands on Earth and assumes the identity of a small-town doctor, leading to a series of increasingly bizarre and hilarious situations as he attempts to understand and assimilate into human culture. The series balances its comedic elements with a deeper philosophical questioning of human value and the nature of existence, creating a unique and engaging viewing experience.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with an alien spacecraft crashing in rural Colorado, and the sole survivor, Harry, assumes the identity of the recently deceased Dr. Thomas Ghent. Initially focused on completing his mission to destroy humanity, Harry struggles to understand human behavior and customs, leading to numerous comedic misunderstandings and awkward encounters. As he spends more time among the residents of Patience, Colorado, he begins to question his mission and develops unexpected connections with the townspeople, particularly his nurse, Aelita. Throughout the series, Harry is pursued by a shadowy government agency determined to uncover his true identity and stop his mission. He must constantly evade capture while simultaneously grappling with his growing empathy for humanity and the moral implications of his actions. The series explores themes of identity, belonging, and the potential for redemption, as Harry's perspective on humanity gradually shifts from one of disdain to one of reluctant admiration.
response.keyword_sentence: Resident Alien is a darkly comic science fiction series set in rural Colorado, exploring themes of identity and redemption through the eyes of an alien struggling to understand humanity and grappling with a moral dilemma.
